index.title: NLP for Social Good
index.slogan: A new initiative aiming to empower NLP researchers who want to consider the societal impact of their work.

content.text: A curated GitHub paper list of NLP on Social Good curated by Zhijing Jin
An idea from the paper 'How Good Is NLP? A Sober Look at NLP Tasks through the Lens of Social Impact'
A survey result overview 'How Current NLP Researchers Think about NLP4SG' based on our NLP4SG survey
A reading group (once a week for 8 weeks) to go through NLP4SG papers & questions with a group of NLP researchers!
